overview: Katherine is a sweet, beautiful girl who has lived her entire life by the teachings of the church. She’s never questioned authority, spoken out of line, or even raised her voice in private. But her desires got the better of her when she fell in love with one of her close friends. Members of the Order have witnessed signs of her transgression and are looking to get her to fall in line for their own desires. She’s too beautiful to not fulfill her duty, to lie with the men of the temple and become wife to the seed bearers.
title: Sister Katherine: Chapters 1-6
